other_title: タイムボカンシリーズ ヤッターマン

#2: "Yatter King (ヤッターキング)" by Masayuki Yamamoto and School Mates Brothers (eps 59-108)
ending_theme: #1: "Tensai Doronbo (天才ドロンボー)" by Noriko Ohara, Jouji Yanami and Kazuya Tatekabe (eps 1-58)
#2: "Doronbo no Shiraake (ドロンボーのシラーケッ)" by Noriko Ohara, Jouji Yanami and Kazuya Tatekabe (eps 59-108)
